original_text: This will be the Feast of Flat Bread, when you eat bread with no yeast in it. You will remember that I brought you all out of the country of Egypt on this day. You marched out like an army, family by family! That is why you must enjoy this day as a special day, for all time. This is a rule that you must always obey.
korean_text: 너희는 무교절을 지키라 이 날에 내가 너희 군대를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내었음이니라 그러므로 너희가 영원한 규례로 삼아 대대로 이 날을 지킬지니라

sentences.original_text: This will be the Feast of Flat Bread,
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 누룩 없는 빵의 절기가 될 것이며,

sentences.original_text: when you eat bread with no yeast in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 누룩 없는 빵을 먹을 때이다.

sentences.original_text: You will remember that I brought you all out
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내가 너희 모두를 인도해냈다는 것을 기억할 것이며,

sentences.original_text: of the country of Egypt on this day.
You marched out like an army,
That is why you must enjoy this day
as a special day, for all time.
This is a rule that you must always obey.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 너희가 항상 순종해야 할 규정이다.
